ModuleDescription: This module will be devoted to in-depth study of quantum algorithms. The module will cover main research areas in this field, such as algorithms for number-theoretic problems, unstructured search and quantum walks, Hamiltonian simulation, query complexity lower bounds, and linear system solvers.
Prerequisite: This module is open to all students in CQT, and those in Computer Science, Mathematics, and in Physics. Students from other departments and faculties are welcome, but it is advisable that they discuss their background with one of the lecturers before registering.
